title: Lisboeta restaurant in London
body: Another day when I was visiting London with my family we found this awesome portuguese restaurant and I was so pleased with their welcoming attitude and service that I just had to leave a comment. Awesome food as well. Well done!
replies: Interesting. Last time when I visited it was crowded, food was cold and average. For that money - disappointed...
Yes, I had an awesome experience as well. The staff was really enthusiastic and food with mediterranean vibe

title: Britannia The International Hotel London, Canary Wharf
body: Eeeh, it was cheaper than some other hotels but not worth even that. The room literally stank, it felt like bed linen hadn't been changed. You go on your own risk.
replies: It was OK. Food average, nice view over London from my room window
A bit too expensive for my liking.

title: The Clermont London, Charing Cross hotel
body: Amazing place. Beautiful view, in the centre of London, the river is walking distance. Rooms really clean and food for an hotel really good.

title: Petersham Nurseries, Covent Garden restaurant
body: Amazing, awesome, that's all what I say.
replies: Nice venue however in my opinion too expensive, food was good but I was still hungry when I left
There was some strage smell when I visited, don't know, was expecting something was upperclass
